## ginkgo-cli note queue

List local events pending sync to remotes

```
ginkgo-cli note queue [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help        help for queue
  -l, --limit int   max events per remote to show (default 10)
```

  -n, --namespace string   override namespace for this command
